name: Yae Miko (Realistic + Anime) LoRA
description:
Yae Miko (Realistic + Anime) LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

There is already a pretty good realistic Yae Miko LoRA, but I didn't find it too accurate or flexible for anime (couldn't change her outfit and got multiple ears). Also I din't like the fact that the "ears" became just a hairstyle, so I wanted to give it a try with my method.

I've tested it on some of my anime models and seems to work as per usual, mainly on AnyLoRA and Anime Pastel Dream. You find prompts and models in the PNG data reported in the info (bottom right corner of the pics). Realistic pics use NeverEnding Dream (NED).

The main trigger word is yae miko but, as usual, you need to describe how you want her, as the model is not very overfitted on it by choice. Weight should be around 1.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
